resources.string:
Welcome to CustomWorkout30!
♦ To create a new workout, click the 'Create New Workout' button to get started.
♦ If you have completed a workout on this app before and wish to view your history, simply select 'view workout history'. 
♦If you are starting a new workout, you will go on to choose your level of difficulty, what kind of cardio you wish to do, and what kind of muscles you wish to focus on.
♦ After your workout is finished, you will have the option to add notes to your workout (i.e. how much weight you lifted, etc).
♦ Once you produce your workout and finish it, you must click 'Save Workout' so that it will be stored in your history.
